about: I am passionate about data analytics and problem-solving. My curiosity drives me to explore new technologies and continuously improve my skills. Whether working on a challenging coding problem or analyzing complex datasets, I find motivation in uncovering insights and optimizing solutions. During my journey, I have taken on projects like Power BI dashboards, SQL analysis, and Python-based data processing, which have strengthened my analytical skills. My goal is to leverage my expertise to create impactful solutions in the field of data science and technology.
